title: Is being safer than Atlanta good enough for Bogotá?
text:
Is being safer than Atlanta good enough for Bogotá? 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
About 1.25 million people die each year in traffic crashes worldwide. If actions aren't taken, that figure could rise — making traffic a...
